FiniteStateMachine
==================

FiniteStateMachine is an abstract class implemented by deterministic automata (DFA) and non-deterministic automata (NFA). The functions listed here can be used by both.


Documentation
-------------

.. automodule:: FiniteStateMachine
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :private-members:
   :special-members:
   :inherited-members:
